0.text: A mess of notes and newspaper clippings about the George and Maria case.

2.text: One note sticks out in particular.

3.text: (A curiosity the police uncovered was Maria's missing necklace.

4.text: It was a family pendant passed down from generation to generation.

5.text: She always kept it safe. but when she went missing, the necklace was nowhere to be found.)
